definition: double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword

sentences.english: It allowed you to protect your helpless offspring from sabre-toothed tigers.
sentences.chinese: 它讓你保護你那些無助的後代免遭劍齒虎的傷害。

sentences.english: This evidence suggested Smilodon lived in groups.
sentences.chinese: 這個證據正好表明劍齒虎是羣居動物。

sentences.english: When did saber-toothed tigers roam the land?
sentences.chinese: 劍齒虎什麼時候曾稱霸於陸地？
